body_content.explanation: the act of including something as part of something larger:
examples: the regular incorporation of organic material into garden soil
The bread dough will rise through the incorporation of air.

body_content.explanation: the process or fact of legally making a company into a corporation or part of a corporation (= a large company or group of companies that is controlled together as a single organization):
examples: The company has been through many changes to its structure since its incorporation.
What was the share capital of the company at its incorporation date?
New business incorporations have increased substantially this year.
